com.whaleal.mars.core.index

类 IndexBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.whaleal.mars.core.index.AnnotationBuilder<Index>

  • 所有已实现的接口:

    class IndexBuilder
extends AnnotationBuilder<Index>
implements Index

      Field[] fields()

      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder fields(List<Field> fields) 
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder name(String name)
      The name of the index to create; default is to let the mongodb create a name (in the form of key1_1/-1_key2_1/-1...)
      IndexOptions options() 
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder options(IndexOptions options)
      Options to apply to the index.
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder sparse(boolean sparse)
      Create the index with the sparse option
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder unique(boolean unique)
      Creates the index as a unique value index; inserting duplicates values in this field will cause errors
      (专用程序包) IndexBuilder value(String value)
      List of fields (prepended with "-" for desc; defaults to asc).

      • options

        IndexBuilder options(IndexOptions options)
        Options to apply to the index. Use of this field will ignore any of the deprecated options defined on Index directly.

      • background

        IndexBuilder background(boolean background)
        Create the index in the background

      • name

        IndexBuilder name(String name)
        The name of the index to create; default is to let the mongodb create a name (in the form of key1_1/-1_key2_1/-1...)

      • sparse

        IndexBuilder sparse(boolean sparse)
        Create the index with the sparse option

      • unique

        IndexBuilder unique(boolean unique)
        Creates the index as a unique value index; inserting duplicates values in this field will cause errors

      • value

        IndexBuilder value(String value)
        List of fields (prepended with "-" for desc; defaults to asc).
